title: Spriggan's Knife
data:
{{version030}} {{flavour|A dainty little knife which was made by Spriggans, or for Spriggans, or possibly from Spriggans. Anyway, it's in some way associated with those fey folk. It is more effective when stabbing unaware enemies, treating them as though they were completely helpless.}} [[File:Spriggan's_knife.png]] '''''the +7 Spriggan's Knife''''' +7 [[dagger]] Converts 50% of [[stabbing|stabs]] to [[sleep]]-tier stabs.
+4 EV
+50 [[Stealth]] ==Desirability== The '''Spriggan's Knife'''{{source ref|0.30.1|art-data.txt|691}} is an incredibly powerful item for [[stab]]bers. Monsters who are distracted, [[confuse]]d, or even those who haven't noticed you yet will have a 50% chance to take a sleep-tier stab, which is often a one-shot for a character with good Short Blades and Stealth skill. There are many ways to get stabs, even against monsters with extreme [[HD]] or [[willpower]]. All monsters can fail to notice you, only a select few monsters are immune to [[throwing net]]s, even fewer are immune to a [[wand of light]], and [[Uskayaw]]'s Line Pass works on any enemy. [[Gozag]], allied [[summon]]s, or animated [[undead]] can distract enemies, which monsters are not immune to. Unfortunately, it isn't much use to other characters unless you find it very early on, since an unbranded dagger is a poor weapon for general combat. ==History== *Prior to [[0.29]], the Spriggan's Knife converted all stabs to sleep-tier stabs. *Prior to [[0.23]], the Spriggan's Knife also had Dex+4 and MR+, but did not convert stabs to sleep-tier stabs. *Prior to [[0.15]], the Spriggan's Knife had a +4, +10 enchantment. *Prior to [[0.14]], the provided MR was only +20. *This weapon was upgraded from a [[knife]] to a dagger with the removal of knives in [[0.9]]. ==References== [[Category:Unrands]] [[Category:Short blades]]
